pageProduct.name: Olay Luminous Cica Super Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

CALMS SKIN FOR HEALTHY GLOW

Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Cica Super Serum is a calming formula enriched with Cica and 99% Pure Niacinamide. It is penetrates 10 surface layers deep^ and is easily absorbed to soothe your skin, for visibly smoother and more even skin tone in 28 days. Suitable for tired-looking skin. Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Cica Super Serum is also formulated without nasties, that means, no parabens, sulphates, phthalates, petrolatum or mineral oils.

^epidermis layer

Size: 30mL

KEY FEATURES

• • Calming formula to soothe your skin, for visibly smoother and more even skin tone in 28 days.
• • Penetrates 10 surface layers deep^ to renew and reveal skin's healthy glow.
• • Suitable for tired-looking skin
• • Fast absorption, non-greasy
• FORMULATED WITHOUT^: Sulphates Parabens Phthalates Petrolatum Mineral Oils
• FORMULATED WITH: Niacinamide 99% Purity (Vitamin B3) Pro-vit B5 Vitamin E
• ^excludes impurities due to manufacturing process

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.
If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water.
If skin irritation develops, discontinue use.

Ingredients

Water, Hexyldecanol, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Xylitol, Tapioca Starch, Panthenol, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Dimethicone, Boron Nitride, Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Mica, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Inositol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-11 Methyl Ether Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyacrylamide, Benzyl Alcohol, Undecylenoyl Phenylalanine, Aminomethyl Propanol, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Laureth-7, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, CI 77891, CI 19140, CI 42090

Directions

Use 2 pumps twice a day after cleansing and toning, and before moisturizer. Apply evenly on face until the serum is absorbed. How to use the auto-dropper: (1) Twist and turn the cap to automatically draw out the serum (2) Press and hold the pump to dispense on palm or fingers.
